name: DevOps Engineer
description:
Your responsibilities will be:

  • Work on tasks from security department;

  • Proactively monitor, support and troubleshoot mission critical systems and applications to ensure the maximum uptime and availability;

  • Implement and improve the DevOps tool set to automate the application configuration and deployment;

  • Implement and improve monitoring infrastructure to ensure visibility of all processes;

  • Implement and maintain AWS infrastructure (mostly computing and networking);

  • Document the new processes and procedures to make sure that all documentation are up-to-date and relevant;

  • Maintain the highest degree of information security implementing industry best practices.

Skills and Experience:

  • 3+ years of relevant work experience in an IT ops role;

  • Strong understanding of the Linux operating system, including network and system configuration, kernel internals, performance tuning;

  • Understanding of networking concepts and technologies;

  • Must have knowledge of: Linux, Ansible, Iptables, IPSec, Git, Docker, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, scripting languages (Bash/Python), AWS or GCP or Azure;

  • Nice to have knowledge of: Terraform, Hashicorp Vault, PKI, IDM, SDLC, GitLab, SAST and DAST;

  • Strong communication skills;

  • A deep sense of ownership and urgency, detail-oriented approach to operations;

  • English B1+

What we offer:

  • Being a part of a modern international technology team, zero bureaucracy, legacy and technical debt;

  • Great opportunities for professional growth and personal fulfillment: great mentors, cool atmosphere, professional conferences around the globe;

  • Remote work from anywhere in the world, flexible schedule;

  • A real wage, pay in hard currency, compensation for VMI, corporate sports and non-core training.
